description: I don't like apps that ignore my carefully selected and obviously preferred window borders and themes. I think this is typical for Snaps but am not sure. Either way, I don't like the look of the app because of this and removed it. Sorry.

I'm loving this application. Within a day of trying it out I was hooked and opted for their upgraded subscription to sync my info to both of my computers. I also want to support their development because this is zippy, useful, and it looks great.

The MVP is going great, updates keep coming,
Great for storing quick notes in a easy to get to and fast to access tool.
I love Keep however this is much better and off the google ecosystem.

Keep up the great work.
summary: Very Handy App for Notes and my goto

description: I use this to quickly make notes and to follow up on spaced repetition based learning reminders. Cool & simple. Thanks.
summary: Very useful. Natural language reminders are cool

description: its a good todo task list concept tho the settings window overlaps and froze when main window its minimized

Excellente avec la possibilité de
 1/ sauvegarder ses notes sur un support externe

3/ajouter des photos graphiques.....
4/ editer des codes en javascript, R, Java........
